abilities.description: Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 60% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage. All attacks on the silenced target will have 100% accuracy.
Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 6 seconds.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
384 mana, 1.6 mana regeneration and 3.2% flat base magic resistance.
22.4 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Bloodthorn
description: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.
trivia: Prior to the July 14, 2017 Patch, Bloodthorn's active ability, Soul Rend, did not have an official name. The name was taken from the Dota 2 Wiki and officially implemented into Dota 2.
